name: Extreme Racing Real Stunt Flying Car
name_original: Extreme Racing Real Stunt Flying Car
description:
Extreme Racing Real Stunt Flying Car

Extreme Racing Real Stunt Flying Simulator is the best car simulator of 2016, thanks to its advanced real physics engine
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free!
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal
stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you.
Now you can drive, drift and feel a sport car for free!

Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.

Key Features:

- Easy controller.
- Realistic acceleration.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Realistic sound environment.
- Accurate physics
